alert.message:
Delhivery Git-sensor Disk  Alert
Only 300MB Disk remaining
alert.name: Git-sensor Volume Space Usage alert

targets.expr:
(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace="devtroncd", persistentvolumeclaim="git-volume-git-sensor-0"})
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{ job="kubelet", namespace="devtroncd", persistentvolumeclaim="git-volume-git-sensor-0"})
)

(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace="devtroncd", persistentvolumeclaim="data-postgresql-postgresql-0"})
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{ job="kubelet", namespace="devtroncd", persistentvolumeclaim="data-postgresql-postgresql-0"})
)
